SELECT item_name, CASE count(*) WHEN 1 THEN 0 ELSE count(*)/2 END item_applied FROM ((SELECT item_name, user_no FROM (SELECT item_name, user_no FROM shop_apply WHERE user_no=#{user_no }) FULL OUTER JOIN shop_items USING (item_name)) UNION ALL (SELECT a.item_name, a.user_no FROM (SELECT item_name, user_no FROM shop_apply WHERE user_no=#{user_no }) a LEFT JOIN shop_items b ON a.item_name = b.item_name)) GROUP BY item_name
